_comment: CTO Config Template - Copy to cto-config.json and customize for your project

defaults._comment_docs: Default values for docs() tool - documentation generation workflows
defaults._comment_code: Default values for task() tool - code implementation workflows
defaults._comment_intake: Default values for intake() tool - project intake workflows
defaults._comment_play: Default values for play() tool - playground test workflows

_field_documentation.defaults.docs.model: Claude model for documentation generation (e.g., claude-opus-4-1-20250805, claude-sonnet-4-20250514, or opus/sonnet for CLAUDE code)
_field_documentation.defaults.docs.githubApp: Default GitHub App for docs workflows
_field_documentation.defaults.docs.includeCodebase: Whether to include existing codebase as markdown context
_field_documentation.defaults.docs.sourceBranch: Default source branch to work from
_field_documentation.defaults.code.model: Model for code implementation CLI (e.g., gpt-4o for Codex or claude-sonnet-4-20250514)
_field_documentation.defaults.code.githubApp: Default GitHub App for code workflows
_field_documentation.defaults.code.continueSession: Whether to continue a previous CLI session by default
_field_documentation.defaults.code.workingDirectory: Default working directory within repository (. for root)
_field_documentation.defaults.code.overwriteMemory: Whether to overwrite the CLI memory file (CLAUDE.md / AGENTS.md) by default
_field_documentation.defaults.code.repository: Default target repository URL (where code gets implemented)
_field_documentation.defaults.code.docsRepository: Default documentation repository URL (where Task Master docs are stored)
_field_documentation.defaults.code.docsProjectDirectory: Default project directory within docs repository
_field_documentation.defaults.code.service: Default service name for workspace isolation (creates workspace-{service} PVC)
_field_documentation.defaults.intake.primary: Primary model configuration for intake workflows
_field_documentation.defaults.intake.research: Research model configuration for intake workflows
_field_documentation.defaults.intake.fallback: Fallback model configuration for intake workflows
_field_documentation.defaults.play.implementationAgent: Default GitHub App for implementation in play workflows
_field_documentation.defaults.play.frontendAgent: Default GitHub App for frontend tasks in play workflows
_field_documentation.defaults.play.qualityAgent: Default GitHub App for quality checks in play workflows
_field_documentation.defaults.play.securityAgent: Default GitHub App for security scanning in play workflows
_field_documentation.defaults.play.testingAgent: Default GitHub App for testing in play workflows
_field_documentation.defaults.play.service: Default service name for play workspace isolation
_field_documentation.defaults.play.maxRetries: Default maximum retry attempts for all agents (can be overridden per agent)
_field_documentation.defaults.play.implementationMaxRetries: Maximum retry attempts for implementation agent (Rex/Blaze)
_field_documentation.defaults.play.frontendMaxRetries: Maximum retry attempts for frontend agent (Blaze)
_field_documentation.defaults.play.qualityMaxRetries: Maximum retry attempts for quality agent (Cleo)
_field_documentation.defaults.play.securityMaxRetries: Maximum retry attempts for security agent (Cipher)
_field_documentation.defaults.play.testingMaxRetries: Maximum retry attempts for testing agent (Tess)
_field_documentation.defaults.play.autoMerge: Whether Tess should automatically merge PRs after approval (true/false)
_field_documentation.defaults.play.parallelExecution: Whether to run independent tasks in parallel (true/false)
_field_documentation.agents: Agent configurations with tool profiles - each agent has githubApp, cli, model, and tools configuration including remote tools and local server access
